name: AHG
tag_list: b2b-mobile-applications, business-mobile-application, enterprise-mobile-software, mobile-knowledge-base, mobile-help-system, visual-help-system, visual-instructions, visual-step-by-step-guide
overview:
AHG provides web based and mobile software for training, knowledge management and customer support.

Our latest product - AHG Cloud Note (mobile application coupled with the cloud service) helps companies to create a comprehensive visual help system for employees and customers. Using the application, company employees can easily create “how to” visual instructions on the spot using the smartphone, by taking images / video and adding explanatory text. They can then upload created documents to the cloud, where company employees / customers can access documents via computer or a smartphone.

Details and fully functional demo for AHG Cloud Note are available at cloudnote.net
